title: 820-2915 shuts down with hard drive attached.
message:
Another 2011 A1286 that will shut down as soon as Apple logo appears when internal or external HDD is attached.

This is on battery only and internal HDD unplugged.

[URL]https://photos.app.goo.gl/sdYpveMtFoRYMOqV2[/URL]

When on charger only and internal HDD unplugged it wont even make it to chime.

This is charger only

[url]https://photos.app.goo.gl/Fn91yGpLOcfU2JoF3[/url]

PPBUS is 12.58V

Thanks.

title: 820-2915 shuts down with hard drive attached.
message: Replace RAM module and try again

title: 820-2915 shuts down with hard drive attached.
message: Hey man thanks for the response.  Switched RAM on both slots... Same outcome. :(

title: 820-2915 shuts down with hard drive attached.
message: apply some heat to GPU to test...

title: 820-2915 shuts down with hard drive attached.
message: I more suspect the CPU Vcore FETs. If no change after heating the GPU change the FETs in the CPU Vcore supply together with U7400.
